abstract: ABC’s “Dancing With the Stars” drew its largest audience of the season on Monday as 24.7 million viewers tuned in at 8 p.m. for the show’s final round of competition, according to Nielsen’s estimates. Thanks to those impressive numbers, ABC led the night’s ratings overall, but the network lost a disappointing number of those viewers as the night wore on.
lead_paragraph: ABC’s “Dancing With the Stars” drew its largest audience of the season on Monday as 24.7 million viewers tuned in at 8 p.m. for the show’s final round of competition, according to Nielsen’s estimates. Thanks to those impressive numbers, ABC led the night’s ratings overall, but the network lost a disappointing number of those viewers as the night wore on.
